meanings.definition: A person who specializes in sabermetrics, the statistical analysis of baseball data.
meanings.sent1: The sabermetricians at the baseball game were busy analyzing player statistics.
meanings.sent2: Many sabermetricians use advanced math to study baseball numbers.
meanings.sent3: The sabermetricians joked that they could predict the game outcome just by looking at the data.
meanings.sent4: She was a sabermetrician, seeing patterns in baseball stats like an artist sees colors.
meanings.sent5: The group of sabermetricians huddled together, discussing the latest player performance trends.

meanings.sent1: The team of sabermetricians presented their findings to the baseball coach.
meanings.sent2: Sabermetricians often collaborate to analyze baseball data more effectively.
meanings.sent3: The sabermetricians celebrated their successful season with a party at the ballpark.
meanings.sent4: In the world of baseball analysis, sabermetricians are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The sabermetricians' office was filled with charts and graphs, a true data-driven environment.
